definition: the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Some argue that it originates from the Zulu for 'making a loud noise'.
sentences.chinese: 有人说是来源于祖鲁语中“制造噪音”的说法。

sentences.english: Seems that fish don't like a din with dinner either.
sentences.chinese: 鱼儿似乎也不喜欢用餐时有噪音。

sentences.english: We must do something to stop the city noise.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须采取措施来控制城市噪音。

sentences.english: Any disturbing noise can be as helpful as silence.
sentences.chinese: 静谧可以帮你找到寂照，扰人的噪音一样也可以。

sentences.english: Don't let the noise of others' opinions down out your own inner voice.
sentences.chinese: 别让他人之见的噪音掩盖了自己来自于心底的声音。

sentences.english: The noise occultation was significant, and the undertone was the easiest one to be occulted.
sentences.chinese: 噪音对信号的掩蔽作用显著，其中低音最易被掩蔽。

sentences.english: The program for discussion is concerned with the control of noise pollution of the city.
sentences.chinese: 要讨论的计划涉及本市噪音污染的控制。

sentences.english: Ben had it out with his roommate about coming back home so late and making a lot of noise.
sentences.chinese: 是有深夜迟归引起一连串噪音，班因而与他起了口角。

sentences.english: More cars would not only bring traffic congestion, but also noise and parking problems.
sentences.chinese: 车辆增加不仅会造成塞车，也会制造噪音和停车问题。

sentences.english: Civil aviation noise-reduction with economic reality.
sentences.chinese: 民航降低噪音与经济现实。

sentences.english: Use earplugs to eliminate noise, an eyeshade to kill the light, and turn the air-conditioning valve on high.
sentences.chinese: 用耳塞降低噪音，用眼罩来遮光，把空调风调大点。

sentences.english: No one in the neighbouring flats was unawakened by the noise.
Aircraft noise is unwitting of passengers.
sentences.chinese: 飞机噪音是旅客不明智所至。

sentences.english: The noise which mke by crs disturbs residents living on both side of the street ll dy nd ll night.
sentences.chinese: 它所产生的噪音使街道两旁的住民日夜不得安宁。

sentences.english: Dolby noise reduction manufactured under the license from Dolby Laboratories Licensing Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 杜比噪音减低系经杜比实验证明公司授权制造。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
